channel.title: Getting Started on David J Nevin
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on David J Nevin

item.title: Vim Commands
item.description: Too Many Vim Commands Getting back into Vim again and decided this time to take it slower and get the basics well in place before I try and incorporate too many commands. It’s the same mentality I’m bringing to my Python journey and will reapply to C#. The note below are a mix of my obsidian notes from when I started using Vim in April of 2021 and resources I’ve used to better understand the commands this time round.
